name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  This coral cannot be found anywhere in Teyvat, but was a gift that the greatserpent obtained when it broke into the Dark Sea. For that abyssal snake, tobe filled with coral was to be mighty, and its power would be shaved away asthose corals were lost. In other words, those corals contain power far beyondthe norm.
